title: Reasons for eating fast food in the U.S. as of August 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 67.2 is found at Response Convenient and the minimum is found at Other where Share of respondents is 5.6.
The highest Response Convenient has 61.6 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Other.
